contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Hensies |picture= |picture-legend= |map=HensiesLocation.png |map-legend=Location of Hensies in Hainaut |arms= |flag=Flag of Hensies.svg |region={{BE-REG-WAL}} |community={{BE-FR}} |province={{BE-PROV-HT}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Mons|Mons]] |nis=53039 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor=Eric Thiebaut |majority=[[Socialist Party (francophone Belgium)|PS]] |postal-codes=7350 |telephone-area=065 |web=[http://www.hensies.be/ www.hensies.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=26 |lon_deg=03 |lon_min=40 }} '''Hensies''' is a [[Wallonia|Walloon]] [[municipality]] located in the [[Belgium|Belgian]] province of [[Hainaut (province)|Hainaut]]. On 1 January 2006 the municipality had 6,698 inhabitants. The total area is 25.99 km², giving a [[population density]] of 258 inhabitants per km². ==References== {{reflist}} [[Image:Hensies JPG07.jpg|thumb|left|256px|Hensies: the Pommeroeul-Condé canal at sunset]] {{Hainaut}} [[Category:Municipalities of Hainaut (province)]] {{Hainaut-geo-stub}}
